snippet.title: Girlish Grimoire Littlewitch Romanesque: Editio Regia – Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.littlewitch.us Play as Domino, you must train two young pupils in the magical arts so they can become great and powerful witches. Take them to the classroom to grow their skills in magic. Send them on quests to test their progress. And mentor them in the value of friendship, a mage's strongest asset.

On Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=357426334
